name: WordAds block
descriptionHtml:
Test

async () => {
  let blockId;
  await (0, _testSetup.step)(
    "Can visit the block editor and add a WordAds block",
    async () => {
      await blockEditor.waitForAvailableBlock(_wordAds.default.name());
      blockId = await blockEditor.insertBlock(
        _wordAds.default.name(),
        _wordAds.default.title()
      );
      await blockEditor.selectPostTitle();
    }
  );
  await (0, _testSetup.step)(
    "Can switch to Wide Skyscraper ad format",
    async () => {
      const adBlock = new _wordAds.default(blockId, page);
      await adBlock.focus();
      await adBlock.switchFormat(4); // switch to Wide Skyscraper ad format
    }
  );
  await (0, _testSetup.step)(
    "Can publish a post and assert that WordAds block is rendered",
    async () => {
      await blockEditor.selectPostTitle();
      await blockEditor.publishPost();
      await blockEditor.viewPost();
      const frontend = await _postFrontend.default.init(page);

      expect(
        await frontend.isRenderedBlockPresent(_wordAds.default)
      ).toBeTruthy();
    }
  );
};
